alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 8:07PM CDT until May 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southwestern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Glenrio, or 19 miles south of Nara Visa, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Romero. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
